detail_desc: Short dress in a viscose weave with small, frilled sleeves, a collar and buttons at the top. Inset lace trims at the front and waist.and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Kangol x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. High, elasticated waist, side pockets, and elastication at the hems.
Soft loafers with soft heel caps so they can also be worn as slip-ons. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in soft, washed denim made from recycled cotton with notch lapels, a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Short skirt in woven fabric with fringes and a visible zip in one side. Lined
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck wrapover bodice and a lined skirt.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Short top in woven fabric with short puff sleeves and a square neckline with ties. Smocking with a frill trim at the top and around the sleeves.
Short, boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Tunic in stretch jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves, an adjustable tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Short, pleated satin skirt with an all-over print and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.
Bag in braided paper straw with round wooden handles at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 13x26x42 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Fully lined 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Matte, opaque tights with extra room for a growing tummy. 100 denier.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, and calf-length legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Short, V-neck dress in soft denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and short sleeves. Chest pockets with a pleat, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps in glittery imitation leather with a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, calf-length legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Microfibre push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastic straps at the back and hook-and-eye fasteners.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, front and back pockets and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with a jersey-lined hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Printed bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with a detachable shoulder strap, flap with appliqués and a metal fastener, and three compartments. Lined. Size 7x13.5x19 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a kangaroo pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Baby Exclusive. Soft blanket in an organic cotton crêpe weave with an all-over print on one side. Size 80x80 cm.
Short dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons on one shoulder and decorative buttons on the other. 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Large scarf woven in a mohair blend with fringes along the short sides.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No fasteners. Lined.
Lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short lace dress with a deep V-neck, narrow, horizontal tie at the back of the neck, long, transparent sleeves and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front and racer back with sections in ventilating mesh. Elastic hem with transparent sections. Medium support.
Hipster briefs in jersey with a low waist with a wide elastic waistband. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Calf-length dress in chiffon with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, pin-tucks at the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with narrow trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Dress in sturdy jersey with a patterned taffeta skirt. Round neckline, cap sleeves and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a large bow and a voluminous, gathered, lined skirt.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Block-coloured top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, asymmetric dress in mesh with gathered seams for a draped effect. Short, gathered sleeves and a visible zip at the hem. Sewn-in jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 0.8 cm to 1.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam with a drawstring under the bust, side pockets, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frilled collar and long raglan sleeves with frilled cuffs.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, a seam at the waist with elastication and an open section at the back, and a peplum. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Double-layer jersey hats, one with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a cotton and linen weave with a collar, button placket, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt in three layers. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck opening, buttons down the front, gathered yoke and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Reverse-stitched, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with woven details. Collar, buttons at the top, a chest pocket with a button, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
